titles: Vertue triumphant, or A liuely description of the foure vertues cardinall dedicated to the Kings Maiestie.
author: Leighton, William, Sir, fl. 1603-1614.
publisher: Printed by Melchisedech Bradwood, for Matthew Lownes,
notes: Running title reads: To the Kings Maiestie.
